description.0: A streamlined profiled accentuated by a lush pillowtop, the sofa sleeper is casual and comfortable for a relaxed look. Its tufted, microfiber cover and sturdy metal legs will add a sense of glamour to any room. With three positions to choose from - sitting, lounging and sleeping - the futon is a versatile piece that suits a variety of living space needs.
description.1: Perfectly sized for your kids to study, play video games, watch TV or listen to music, the DHP Ariana Junior Futon is a great addition to any child's room. With its microfiber upholstery, this junior futon is simple and casual, complementing any room décor. Its low seat height makes it ideal for kids and tweens. The multi-position back features Click-Clack technology that quickly converts this futon from sitting to lounging to sleep position. Your little one will relax comfortably with the DHP Ariana Junior Futon!
description.2: Add some contrasting colors into your home with this Futon! Its two tone faux leather upholstery and white contrasting stitching paired with its modern tufting design and silver legs will add a contemporary flair to your home décor.  Built with a sturdy frame, this futon effortlessly converts from a sofa to a sleeper, making it convenient to have for any of your overnight guests. This Futon is guaranteed to be a crowd pleaser!
description.3: Perfect for small spaces, the futon combines simplicity and style for everyday living. Designed for ultimate seating comfort, its compact size has padded seats and is upholstered in lush microfiber. The slanted metal legs complete the look of this stylish piece. Featuring a multi-position back, this futon easily converts into a sleeper great for entertaining guests!
description.4: Style meets functionality in the DHP Lodge Futon Frame and Mattress. This modular futon and mattress can be converted from a sofa to a bed in less than a minute, thanks to the incorporated Click-Clack sofa technology. Featuring a wooden frame, this futon is strong and sturdy. The mattress section is upholstered in microfiber that makes the futon comfortable for sitting or sleeping for long hours. As this futon and mattress is available in black color, it mingles well with almost all color schemes. This Lodge Futon Frame and Mattress by DHP requires assembly upon arrival. It has a maximum weight carrying capacity of 600 lbs.
description.5: Enjoy total comfort and luxury with style by getting home the InRoom Designs Klik-Klak Convertible Sofa. This convertible sofa has a wooden frame, which ensures years of reliable use. It has foam-filled upholstery and tufted cushions, which makes it extremely comfortable and plush. The convertible sofa gets can be adjusted in a sitting, lounging, or sleeping positions accordingly. It has the capacity to hold weight up to 200 pounds. The convertible sofa is a part of the Klik-Klak collection.
description.6: This convertible sofa is truly in a category of its own. Its elegance is only rivalled by its comfort. Together they make this convertible sofa a wonderful piece of furniture that is sure to impress.
description.7: A refreshing take on a classic design, this Futon and Mattress is a timeless piece that will perfectly accent any living space! Its streamlined design is wrapped in a lush, brushed microfiber fabric giving it a vintage, yet contemporary flair. The detailed diamond tufting adds to the richness and comfort. Featuring a multi-position back, this Futon and Mattress converts from a lounger to a sleeper, to best fit your needs.
description.8: Revamp the interiors of your home with the Milton Green Star Twin Convertible Sofa. This convertible sofa is upholstered in microfiber, which gives you the much needed comfort and rest. It gets easily converted into a sleeper whenever required. The convertible sofa features a convenient drop down cup holder and an arm rest. For added style and comfort, this convertible sofa features tufted cushions. This Twin Convertible Sofa from Milton Green Star has a futon design with a graceful solid print. The convertible sofa is available in multiple colors for you to choose from. It is most suitable for residential use.
description.9: Serta Dream - a collection of stylish convertibles that turn from sofa by day to a dream sleeper at night. From individual encased coils to quilted memory foam to ensure comfort.
description.10: Create a comfortable lounge area for family and friends with the DHP Dillan Futon. Upholstered in plush, microfiber cover with stylish horizontal stitching, and tapered legs, this futon has a casual and relaxed look. The multi-position back features clack-clack technology, easily converting this Futon to a sleeper. Offering exceptional comfort and space, pair the DHP Dillan Futon with its matching Chaise, to get a sectional sofa or an extra-large sleeping area.
description.11: The Delaney Convertible Sofa by DHP is classy sofa-bed that will add style to your living room with its rich faux leather upholstery, beautiful contrast stitching and sophisticated design. It converts quickly and with very little effort from sofa to full size bed thanks to "click clack" technology. The upholstery is easy to maintain and wipes clean.
description.12: Completely unique, the Zipline Loveseat with two accompanying ottomans features a customizable mod design to enhance any room. With its 3-tiered multifunctional design, this loveseat creates the perfect layout for your space with the ability to customize it at the zipline of a wrist. Relax with a friend in the comfortable two-seat sofa with ottomans, or stack the ottomans inside for a large gaming table or seating pad. Even better, fold it out completely and rest on the comfy queen-size daybed. You can even stack one ottoman inside for a built in side-table or workstation while seated. The removable covers feature stylish black zippers and are machine-washable.The Zipline Loveseat will complement your decor beautifully, and you have the freedom to change your space with individual covers.
description.13: Incorporate style and functionality to your living space with the DHP Nola futon. Its clean design and button tufting have an aesthetic appeal that will fit perfectly with any room décor. Perched on round silver legs, the cushions are encased in rich faux leather. Perfect as a two-seater and a lounger, the DHP Nola futon also folds down to a sleeper that is great for entertaining guests!
description.14: Renovate the interiors of your home with the Wildon Home Convertible Sofa. This convertible sofa is upholstered in faux leather, which gives you the much needed comfort and rest. The convertible sofa is available in multiple colors, which lets you choose the one that seamlessly blends with your living room decor. This Convertible Sofa from Wildon Home gets easily converted into a bed whenever required. It is most suitable for residential use.
description.15: Add a contemporary flair to your living room with the Gold Sparrow Atlanta Convertible Sectional Sofa Bed. This 3-n-1 convertible sofa converts into a twin bed as well as a lounger, perfect for overnight guests or Sunday afternoon lounging.  Matching bolsters are included for extra comfort.
description.19: DHP Contempo futon, microfiber, futon, lounger, sleeper, arms fold down, click clack technology.
description.21: Invitingly plush, the DHP Allegra futon will bring instant comfort to your living area. The multi-position back quickly and easily converts this futon from lounger to sleeper. Versatile and practical, the DHP Allegra futon will become an instant favorite in any home!
description.22: DHP's Delaney Convertible Sofa Bed is stylish, practical and affordable. You will be impressed with its versatility, adaptability and range of uses, while at the same time enjoying its comfort, style and class. Easily-assembled and quickly convertible from couch to lounger to sleeper, the contemporary Delaney Futon Sofa Bed will suit your many needs for years to come.
description.23: DHP Sola Futon with Storage, microfiber upholstery, storage compartments underneath pull out to reveal storage for books, blankets, pillows, and more. Multi position back converts the futon from a lounger to sleeper, perfect for overnight guests.
description.25: Indulge yourself in some quality time with DHP's edge futon! The black microfiber upholstery along with its tufted and pillow-like design are so inviting you won't be able to resist. Designed to be an attractive piece in your living décor, this futon also comes in handy as an extra bed for overnight guests. Whether you want to sit, sleep or relax, the edge futon is a simple pick for any room décor.
description.26: The DHP Metropolitan Futon Lounger II has that perfect blend of sophistication and functionality that you are looking for. Designed for a contemporary space, this futon lounger has a subtle grey finish and features a simple and uniform stitched design. Made using linen fabric, this futon lounger is the perfect furniture to relax and unwind on. The Metropolitan Futon Lounger II from DHP can be converted from a sofa to a bed in less than a minute. Featuring a wooden frame, this futon lounger is strong and sturdy. It has a maximum weight carrying capacity of 600 lbs. The futon lounger is CARB compliant and maintains indoor air sanitation. Wipe it clean with a damp cloth and this futon lounger will look new for years together.
description.27: Make entertaining and accommodating overnight guests easy with this sofa bed and ottoman collection. Not only can you comfortably seat many people on these plush microfiber pieces, you can also create a king sized bed by combining the sofa bed and chaise sofa bed. Accent pillows included.

This furniture features storage space beneath the seats and a sectional sofa that can easily converted into bed position.
description.30: With a comfort-oriented design, this convertible chair bed is multifunctional and takes full advantage of any available space. The contemporary seating can be used as a chair, chaise or bed.

Experience the ultimate comfort and relaxation with this Julia Convertible Sofa from DHP.

Occupying very little floor space, this sofa proves to be a convenient option to use in dormitories, hostel rooms, or rooms with a restricted floor area. Featuring a contemporary style, this sofa has a single seat cushion and innerspring coils, which are wrapped with foam fill. It is upholstered in high-quality cotton, and remains to be available in multiple upholstery shades. This futon sleeper sofa is versatile and converts to a full size mattress, in a matter of seconds. It also has a shallow storage compartment at the bottom, which can be easily used to stockpile extra pillows, bed covers, or blankets. It has pillow arms-tops, which are perfect to rest your hands while lying back and enjoying a movie. This convertible sofa is easy to maintain and can be easily cleaned with a soft cloth dipped in mild soap solution. It requires some assembly and can be easily put together without any tools.

The Sophia convertible is luxurious comfort to immerse yourself in. Given that the Sophia Serta Dream Convertible is jointly created by furniture maker Lifestyle Solutions and bedding maker Serta, you are sure to get the best in quality, comfort and durability.

Cover is constructed of high elasticity foam and the top layered with poly fiber to insure total comfort. Item comes with a hidden storage unit below seat cushion.

description.46: Gracefully curved leg design, abundantly plush upholstery, and contemporary design are some of the ways to describe the Lugo sofa sleeper. For relaxing seating and a great night's sleep rolled into one, order a Lugo futon sleeper today!

Featuring a contemporary style, it is a feasible option to use in modern or new-age decors. With this lounger, you can just lay back or sit upright for hours together without straining your back. The Lex Convertible Lounger from Hokku Designs is made from a premium-quality wooden frame for unsurpassed sturdiness and durability. It has a heavy-duty foam filling, which is soft enough to support your back and help you maintain a good posture. This convertible lounger is upholstered in faux leather to give it rich and classy esthetics. It is available in a range of upholstery colors, which can be chosen to complement the decor or color scheme of your room. This lounger can adjust to five different positions, thus ensuring that you remain relaxed at all times. It has a weighing capacity of 325 pounds, and can also be used as a bed, if laid flat on the ground. It requires some assembly with an Allen wrench or screwdriver.
description.361: The uniquely designed convertible sofa adds contemporary elegance that is versatile enough to complement any office or home decor. The red twill fabric will be a great accent to any living room. It features a unique European click-clack mechanism to allow smooth adjustment between positions. Sofa can be pulled apart into individual swivel seats.
description.362: Warmly designed with comfort in mind, this smooth and inviting piece is a chic choice for any room. The versatile split back design can offer customized comfort without taking up more space than necessary. Easily convert into a bed for unexpected guests and allow the pillow top design to speak for itself with its plush foam filling and warm flannelette upholstery. Angled chrome legs offer stable support for any activities, ensuring this piece is a sleek choice for every modern home.
description.366: This chic contemporary futon is an undeniable upgrade from the college dorm variety. Sleek and minimalist, the Sawyer designer futon with wooden frame, foam cushions, faux leather, and steel legs with non-marking feet. The split backrest features two separately-operated adjustable sections that can be set at varying angles from upright as a sofa to flat as a bed. Additionally, the ends of the sleeper sofa adjust similarly to serve as armrests. To clean, wipe with a damp cloth and dry immediately.
description.367: 100% Cotton canvas. 2 Position function. Easily converts from sitting to lounging to sleeping. Perfect for apartments without a lot of space. Metal chrome legs.
description.368: The futon is a classic hardwood frame with mission style arms. This unique and versatile full size futon sofa easily converts to a bed. This multi-functional piece of furniture can find a home in just about any type of room.
description.369: The Starlight sofa bed is the best choice for homes with tight space that need a place to sit, a place to store, and an extra bed. This sofabed, has storage compartments underneath in addition to an easy bed conversion mechanism.
description.370: A modern gem designed for comfort and style, this convertible futon sofa is sure to add a contemporary touch to any home. This piece easily converts from sofa, to chaise, to a spacious bed, suitable for all your relaxation needs. Padded for comfort and expertly upholstered in soft yet durable fabric for timeless style, and supported by a sturdy chrome-finished metal frame. Lend lasting quality and style to your home with this gorgeous piece.
description.372: The futon is a classic hardwood frame with mission style arms. This unique and versatile full size futon sofa easily converts to a bed. This multi-functional piece of furniture can find a home in just about any type of room.
description.373: The simplicity of a minimalist sofa and the versatility of a sofa bed are just two reasons why the Shelby Sofa Bed is a new favorite. This sturdy piece is made with a wooden frame, metal legs, foam cushioning, and beige linen upholstery. When temporary sleeping space is a must, simply remove the backrest cushions, pull forward the seat, and fold down the backrest into a futon. Spot cleaning is recommended.
description.374: Transform and enjoy the comforts of your Living Room with this attractive contemporary design multi color fabric Sofa Bed. Durability and long lastingness are some of the benefits of the hardwood frame. Constructed of a vinyl fabric with wood frame, and metal legs.
description.375: Integrated views extend seamlessly with the convertible Fancy Style Sofa. From a spacious bench to an armless three-seat sofa, imbue your room with the ultimate in evolutionary functionality. A polished chrome frame completes this piece of structural sophistication and gracious returns.
description.378: The futon is a classic hardwood frame with tray style arms. This unique and versatile full size futon sofa easily converts to a bed. This multi-functional piece of furniture can find a home in just about any type of room.
description.379: The futon is a classic hardwood frame with mission style arms. This unique and versatile full size futon sofa easily converts to a bed. This multi-functional piece of furniture can find a home in just about any type of room.
description.381: The Phila multi-functional micro suede sleeper sofa and ottoman set offers a contemporary design. Multi-functional purpose oriented, designed with comfort and maximized functions in mind to take full advantage of the space.
description.383: The futon is a classic hardwood frame with tray style arms. This unique and versatile full size futon sofa easily converts to a bed. This multi-functional piece of furniture can find a home in just about any type of room.
description.384: The lodge futon frame is a rustic hardwood frame with that classic up north feel. The clear finish on this frame allows the natural beauty of the wood grain to come through. In addition to it's rustic charm, the frame also converts from the sofa position, to a lounging position, and finally into the bed position.
description.385: The Phila multi-functional storage sleeper sofa offers a contemporary design. Featuring a unique European design mechanism, makes it easy to convert sofa to bed in just seconds. This Sleeper sofa is multi-functional purpose oriented, designed with comfort and maximized functions in mind to take full advantage of the space.
description.388: The upholstery grade fabric is machine tufted onto the innerspring mattress, giving the futon a sofa-like appearance. The fabric is durable, breathable and easy to clean. The full-size innerspring mattress is constructed of 13-gauge springs with a 272 coil count for support and durability. The springs are supported with high density foam layers of natural blended batted cotton for maximum comfort. Add a touch of style and flair with Big Tree Furniture.
description.389: The upholstery grade fabric is machine tufted onto the innerspring mattress, giving the futon a sofa-like appearance. The fabric is durable, breathable and easy to clean. The full-size innerspring mattress is constructed of 13-gauge springs with a 272 coil count for support and durability. The springs are supported with high density foam layers of natural blended batted cotton for maximum comfort. Add a touch of style and flair with Big Tree Furniture.
description.390: Elevate the interiors of your home with the Wildon Home Convertible Sofa. This convertible sofa is upholstered in bi-cast vinyl and foam-filled cushions, which gives you the much needed comfort and rest. It features an appealing espresso color on a splendid solid pattern that blends well with your home décor. For added style and comfort, this convertible sofa features tufted cushions. The convertible sofa features a convenient drop down cup holder and an arm rest that lets you enjoy your beverage within easy reach. This Convertible Sofa from Wildon Home is well-suited for residential use. The convertible sofa gets easily converted into a bed.
description.391: Update your living space with this modern futon sofa. The convertible design is a perfect addition for maximizing space while the sleek leatherette upholstery amps up the chic appeal. Lined tufting provides design and dimension to the overall appearance, ensuring the sofa fits into any living setting. A hidden support leg is conveniently tucked away in the sofa back to ensure, when the sofa has been converted into a bed, that your guests are steadily supported for peaceful sleep.
description.392: The upholstery grade fabric is machine tufted onto the innerspring mattress, giving the futon a sofa-like appearance. The fabric is durable, breathable and easy to clean. The full-size innerspring mattress is constructed of 13-gauge springs with a 272 coil count for support and durability. The springs are supported with high density foam layers of natural blended batted cotton for maximum comfort. Add a touch of style and flair with Big Tree Furniture.
description.393: Contemporary design blends with modular function to give you a stylish convertible futon that will enhance any living space. The split-back design allows you to select multiple positions for unique comfort with an easy adjust click clack mechanism. Convert the futon to a laid back lounger or a comfortable bed making it ideal for overnight company.  With chromed silver square track legs, sturdy construction, and generously padded pillow top upholstered in an leather look material, this piece is built to last. Fashion forward and functional, this futon is the ideal space saving solution making it a must have in your home.
description.394: This frame design features a classic Mission style arm that supports a wide, flat arm surface.
description.395: The Rhodes Jr. twin chair and ottoman set will add a unique style to your living or working area. The Rhodes chair itself provides affordable seating options without sacrificing quality or beauty. The ottoman not only creates a relaxing place to put your feet up, but together with the Rhodes chair creates a convenient sleep surface for guests.
description.397: The Mali is a twin sized futon with innovative capabilities.  Each side has six positional wings that can form the Mali into a sofa, lounger and sleeper. Custom cushions and pillows decorate the Mali while offering superior comfort. A special line of coordinating fabric hues are available exclusively for this frame. The Mali is the perfect addition to a home, office, dorm and apartment.

With the right room accents, the silver Evolution can bring out a creative industrial look to your room.

Dream Microfibers are densely weaved synthetic fabric made possible with the latest fabric production technology. The result is the tiniest man-made fiber (one hundred times finer than a human hair) that are soft, lightweight and easy to care for. Its unique characteristics ensure the best resistance to abrasion and daily wear and tear.
Seat and back cushion- high density foam, super soft foam, and polyester
Tufted seat design
Removable arm rest
Comfortably sleeps two people
Fitted with patented Vise Protection System
The Patented Vise Protection System eliminates any possibility of splitting and cracking at key stress points of the furniture during conversion and usage. The system uses a custom steel reinforced bracket support system placed strategically throughout the furniture, ensuring years of high performance
The Padding - Deep padded back & seat designed for maximum comfort and durability; filled with premium conjugate fiber and/or foam. All Prefect sleepers feature and additional layer of convoluted foam
Polyester fiber 0.75'' Provides a gentle surface feel
The Frame - Solid Wooden Frame. The strength of sofas is guaranteed by a wooden structure designed to withstand the carious stresses to which it is subjected during its working life
Reinforced Wood Blocks for Frame Support - Hardwood support used in all stress areas, reinforced with dowels, screws, glue and staples when needed
Spring Belts - High resistance belts, patented for furniture application are mounted on the frame. These contribute to achieving the optimum comfort together with the padding
The Covering - Dream Microsuede carefully selected for wearability, easy maintenance, beauty and comfort
Solid Wood Storage Frame
Patented Vise Protection System
Metal / Wood Reinforced Plates
Deep Padded Arms
Coil Spring Construction throughout the entire sofa, extra long no-sag spring construction in the back for a resilient base
The Feet - An integral part of the sofa, the feet are either solid wood or metal with a chrome finish. Screwed in with the additional reinforced metal/wood plate to ensure a sturdy joint. Detachable for easy delivery
